about_the_game:
Time Attacker is a racing simulator in which you have to compete in lap time with other players on the leaderboard.

— Time is compared only on identical cars. Everything is fair!
— Realistic physics of car.
— It's a pure race. No modern electronic help system in car. No traction control. No ABS. No Electronic Stability Control. You have to try hard to keep the car on the track!
— Various RWD, FWD and AWD cars.
— Familiar tracks with challenging sections.
— Day and night races.
— A lot of pleasant details for motorsport enthusiast.

If all 4 wheels are off the track, the time will not be counted. Try again!

Fast? Prove it on the track!

— Time is compared only on identical cars. Everything is fair!

name: Time Attacker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.9 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.6 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: No traction control. No ABS. Only car and skill. You are fast? Prove it!
